tool_description: Generates comprehensive database access policies combining roles, permissions, and security rules into enforceable policy documents.

policy_name.description: Unique name for the access policy

policy_type.description: Policy classification: standard, restrictive, permissive, compliance

allowed_operations.description: Database operations permitted by this policy

audit_level.description: Auditing level: none, basic, detailed, comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid policy type: Use one of [standard, restrictive, permissive, compliance]
Role not found: One or more specified roles do not exist
Invalid operation: One or more operations are not recognized
Conflicting operations: Same operation appears in both allowed and denied lists
Invalid time restriction format: Use proper time format (HH:MM-HH:MM, days)
Invalid IP restriction format: Use valid CIDR notation or IP ranges
Invalid audit level: Use one of [none, basic, detailed, comprehensive]
Invalid priority: Priority must be between 1 and 100
Invalid date range: Effective date must be before expiration date
usage: Provide policy_name, policy_type, target_roles, and allowed_operations. Optionally configure denied_operations, time_restrictions, ip_restrictions, data_classification_rules, audit_level, priority, and date ranges for comprehensive policy control.

policy_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated policy

affected_users.description: Number of users affected by this policy
